channel.title: Materials Science on Bella Fishman's Resume
channel.description: Recent content in Materials Science on Bella Fishman's Resume

item.title: Thermal Runaway Measurement and Severity Level on Li-Ion Batteries. Data in Brief
item.description: Thermal Runaway Measurement and Severity Level on Li-Ion Batteries. Data in Brief, Vol. 55, August 2024

item.title: Research Assistant with Stupp Group
item.description: I have experience as a research assistant with the Stupp Group at Northwestern University. Synthesized and tested properties of an oxygen reactive hydrogel using UV-VIS spectroscopy and fluorometry. Enhanced research quality by implementing meticulous data collection and analysis methods.

item.title: Mechanically induced thermal runaway severity analysis for Li-ion batteries, Journal of Energy Storage
item.description: Mechanically induced thermal runaway severity analysis for Li-ion batteries, Journal of Energy Storage, Vol. 61, May 2023

item.title: Research Intern with Ke Group
item.description: I have experience as a research assistant with the Ke Group at Dartmouth College. Optimized synthesis of direct ink writing 3D printable hydrogel for more consistent extrudability. Analyzed gel rheology to unveil insights into its self-healing properties and viscosity. Showcased research findings by presenting a poster at colloquium.

item.title: Research Intern at Oak Ridge National Lab
item.description: I have experience as a research intern with the Dr. Hsin Wang at Oak Ridge National Laboratory. I worked to test the thermal runaway reactivity of different charges, capacities, and chemistries of Lithium Ion batteries commonly used in cars.
